body: Thanks, Abraham. The reason to use the **Run EP component** is because it can get the **PV related output**. Nevertheless, it seems I'm getting more and more errors: 1. using the previous GH file, I added the **updated Run EP simulation** component which still didn't output cooling loads, and the html file is not generated at all although its address is indicated: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hwmAImwnn9dC5Xuv16O12FHYlfzi8wRb1dmKAxTTqKMu1z82pkUPstWJrnO50tk-xzc5rdyR7-rQVjVLHdlqwMzf6sP43ofn/Image5.png) 2. So, following Abraham's suggestion, i tried the new **LB-updateGHFile** component which gives the following error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hwmAImwnn9cFTf*tSwNhrfrdMO4DCcE2TiPaW6Dr9613HovfiwtExTjgk1sHeu3ruEpBvtdnOxLulj3OaKwssTiKA*uiniau/Image6.png) 3. in addition, the **mass intersection** component gives a warning for which replacing this component doesn't seem to help.... [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/hwmAImwnn9dKkFmEaNGbfo2V4STGazOiuFAK7d-ZZXKpTORqP90u9f6fC0e-Wc9MHkNXydtyaIAHPnqG6UXzoSRY8jDuVKUT/Image7.png) The GH file with these errors is attached here. Hope you guys can kindly advise: 1. why the cooling loads output is missing 2. why the LB-updateGHFile is not working 3. why the mass intersection component suddenly stops working .... Thanks a lot.
